Detailed Description

Level, where the game is actually played.

Member Function Documentation

void Level::AddCorridor ( int  room1,
int  side1,
int  room2,
int  side2,
int  length 
)

Adds a corridor between rooms.

This is the function that actually places rooms.

void Level::LeaveRoom (  ) 

Leave the current room.

If the ball is leaving a room, make sure rooms on both sides of the corridor are loaded into the physics engine.

void Level::EnterRoom ( int  roomNumber  ) 

Enter a room - register it with the collision manager.

If the ball is entering a room, we need to remove the room it recently exited from the physics. We do this by removing everything and then adding only the room we just entered.
